00013 TcpServer::TcpServer(int port, int pid)
00014 : MsgSocket(Socket::TCP), TcpNoDelayMode(false)
00015 {

00021 TcpServer::~TcpServer()
00022 {
00023         Disconnect();
00024         Close();
00025 
00026         if ( BufferForMultipleClients )
00027         {
00028                 delete [] BufferForMultipleClients;
00029                 BufferForMultipleClients = NULL;
00030         }
00031 }

00033 void TcpServer::Create(int port)
00034 {
00035         InitForTcpServer(port);
00036         StartThread();
00037 }

00039 void TcpServer::Disconnect()
00040 {  
00041         listConnections.Lock();
00042 
00043         for(listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00044         {
00045                 delete listConnections.GetCurrent();
00046                 listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00047         }
00048 
00049         listConnections.Unlock();
00050 }
00051 
00052 void TcpServer::Close()
00053 {
00054         StopThread();
00055         GetSocket()->Close();
00056 }

00058 int TcpServer::SendToClient(int len, const char* buf, unsigned int pid)
00059 {
00060         // OmiscidTrace( "TcpServer::SendToClient\n");
00061         listConnections.Lock();
00062         MsgSocket* ms = FindClientFromId(pid);
00063         int nb_send = 0;
00064         if(ms)
00065         {
00066                 //ms->IsConnected()  : tested by FindClientFromId
00067                 try
00068                 {
00069                         nb_send = ms->Send(len, buf);
00070                 }
00071                 catch( SocketException &e )
00072                 {
00073                         OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to %8.8x peer : %s (%d)\n", pid, e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00074                 }
00075         }
00076         listConnections.Unlock();
00077         return nb_send;
00078 }

00080 int TcpServer::SendToClient(int* tab_len, const char** tab_buf, int nb_buf, unsigned int pid)
00081 {
00082         listConnections.Lock();
00083 
00084         MsgSocket* ms = FindClientFromId(pid);
00085         int nb_send = 0;
00086 
00087         if(ms)
00088         {
00089                 //ms->IsConnected() tested by FindClientFromId
00090                 try
00091                 {
00092                         nb_send = ms->SendCuttedMsg(tab_len, tab_buf, nb_buf);
00093                 }
00094                 catch( SocketException &e )
00095                 {
00096                         OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to %8.8x peer : %s (%d)\n", pid, e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00097                 }
00098         }
00099         listConnections.Unlock();
00100         return nb_send;
00101 }

00103 int TcpServer::SendToAllClients(int len, const char* buf)
00104 {
00105         int nb_clients = 0;
00106         int TotalLen;
00107         MsgSocket * ms;
00108 
00109         // Check if we have someone to serve
00110         listConnections.Lock();
00111         if ( listConnections.GetNumberOfElements() == 0 )
00112         {
00113                 listConnections.Unlock();
00114                 return 0;
00115         }
00116         listConnections.Unlock();
00117 
00118         ProtectedSend.EnterMutex();
00119         TotalLen = MsgSocket::PrepareBufferForBip( BufferForMultipleClients, buf, len );
00120         if ( TotalLen == -1 )
00121         {
00122                 ProtectedSend.LeaveMutex();
00123                 return -1;
00124         }
00125 
00126         listConnections.Lock();
00127         for(listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00128         {
00129                 ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00130                 if( ms->IsConnected() )
00131                 {
00132                         try
00133                         {
00134                                 ms->SendPreparedBuffer(TotalLen, BufferForMultipleClients);
00135                                 nb_clients++;
00136                         }
00137                         catch( SocketException &e )
00138                         {
00139                                 OmiscidTrace( "Error while sending to all peers : %s (%d)\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00140                         }
00141                 }
00142                 else
00143                 {
00144                         listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00145                         delete ms;
00146                 }
00147         }
00148         listConnections.Unlock();
00149 
00150         ProtectedSend.LeaveMutex();
00151 
00152         return nb_clients;
00153 }

00159         MsgSocket * ms;

00166                 return 0;

00168         listConnections.Unlock();

00172         {
00173                 ProtectedSend.LeaveMutex();
00174                 return -1;

00191                         }
00192                 }

00207 int TcpServer::GetNbConnections()
00208 {
00209         MsgSocket * ms;
00210 
00211         listConnections.Lock();
00212         for(listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next())
00213         {
00214                 ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00215                 if( !ms->IsConnected() )
00216                 {
00217                         listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00218                         delete ms;
00219                 }
00220         }
00221 
00222         int nb = (int)listConnections.GetNumberOfElements();
00223         listConnections.Unlock();
00224         return nb;
00225 }

00227 bool TcpServer::AcceptConnection(MsgSocket* sock)
00228 {
00229         // OmiscidTrace( "in TcpServer::acceptConnection(MsgSocket*) %u\n", sock->GetPeerPid());
00230 
00231         // OmiscidTrace( "TcpServer::AcceptConnection:: connection from (%s)\n", sock->GetSocket()->GetConnectedHost().GetStr());
00232 
00233         listConnections.Lock();
00234 
00235         // Init the socket
00236         // REVIEW: Inherit my SyndLink data
00237         mutex.EnterMutex();
00238         if ( SyncLinkData.GetLength() != 0 )
00239         {
00240                 sock->SetSyncLinkData( SyncLinkData  );
00241         }
00242         // If we have a fonction set to process LincSyncData, set it to the opened connection
00243         if ( callbackSyncLinkFct )
00244         {
00245                 sock->SetCallbackSyncLink( callbackSyncLinkFct, callbackSyncLinkData.userData1, callbackSyncLinkData.userData2 );
00246         }
00247         mutex.LeaveMutex();
00248 
00249         // Add all my listener to the new socket
00250         CallbackObjects.Lock();
00251         for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00252         {
00253                 // Add this listener
00254                 sock->AddCallbackObject( CallbackObjects.GetCurrent() );
00255         }
00256         CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00257 
00258         sock->SetTcpNoDelay(TcpNoDelayMode);
00259         sock->SetName(GetName());
00260         sock->SetServiceId(GetServiceId());
00261         sock->SetMaxMessageSizeForTCP(MsgSocket::GetMaxMessageSizeForTCP());
00262         sock->StartThread();
00263 
00264         listConnections.Add(sock);
00265         listConnections.Unlock();
00266 
00267         // Send empty message information
00268         sock->SendSyncLinkMsg();
00269 
00270         return true;
00271 }
00272 
00273 bool TcpServer::AddCallbackObject(MsgSocketCallbackObject * CallbackObject)
00274 {
00275         if ( MsgSocket::AddCallbackObject( CallbackObject ) == false )
00276         {
00277                 return false;
00278         }
00279 
00280         MsgSocket* ms;
00281         listConnections.Lock(); 
00282         for(listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00283         {
00284                 ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00285                 if( ms->IsConnected() )
00286                 {
00287                         ms->AddCallbackObject( CallbackObject );
00288                 }
00289                 else
00290                 {
00291                         listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00292                         delete ms;
00293                 }
00294         }
00295         listConnections.Unlock();
00296 
00297         return true;
00298 }

00352 int TcpServer::GetListPeerId(SimpleList<unsigned int>& list_peer)
00353 {
00354         MsgSocket * ms;
00355         int nb = 0;
00356 
00357         listConnections.Lock(); 
00358         for(listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00359         {
00360                 ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00361                 if( !ms->IsConnected() )
00362                 {
00363                         listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00364                         delete ms;
00365                 }
00366                 else
00367                 {
00368                         list_peer.Add(ms->GetPeerPid());    
00369                         nb++;
00370                 }
00371         }
00372         listConnections.Unlock();
00373         return nb;
00374 }

00376 void TcpServer::SetServiceId(unsigned int pid)
00377 {
00378         // Check validity of a service Id
00379         if ( (pid & ComTools::CONNECTOR_ID) == 0 )
00380         {
00381                 // pid = pid | 0xffffff01;
00382 #ifdef DEBUG
00383                 //              fprintf( stderr, "Warning: ConnectorId could not be 0 for TcpServer. Value changes to 1 (PeerId = %8.8x)\n", pid );
00384 #endif
00385         }
00386         MsgSocket::SetServiceId(pid); 
00387 
00388         listConnections.Lock();
00389         for(listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00390         {
00391                 if( listConnections.GetCurrent()->IsConnected() )
00392                 {
00393                         listConnections.GetCurrent()->SetServiceId(pid);
00394                 }
00395                 else
00396                 {
00397                         delete listConnections.GetCurrent();
00398                         listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00399                 }
00400         }
00401         listConnections.Unlock();
00402 }

00404 void TcpServer::SetMaxMessageSizeForTCP(int max)
00405 {
00406         MsgSocket::SetMaxMessageSizeForTCP(max);
00407 
00408         listConnections.Lock();
00409         for(listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00410         {
00411                 if(listConnections.GetCurrent()->IsConnected())
00412                         listConnections.GetCurrent()->SetMaxMessageSizeForTCP(max);
00413                 else
00414                 {
00415                         delete listConnections.GetCurrent();
00416                         listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00417                 }
00418         }
00419         listConnections.Unlock();
00420 }

00422 MsgSocket* TcpServer::FindClientFromId(unsigned int id)
00423 {
00424         MsgSocket * ms;
00425 
00426         for( listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00427         {
00428                 ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00429                 if( *ms == id )
00430                 {
00431                         if( ms->IsConnected() )
00432                         {
00433                                 return ms;
00434                         }
00435                         else 
00436                         {
00437                                 delete listConnections.GetCurrent();
00438                                 listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00439                                 // look forward to look if there is not another pid
00440                         }
00441                 }
00442         }
00443 
00444         unsigned int SearchId = id & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID;
00445 
00446         for( listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00447         {
00448                 ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00449                 if( SearchId == (ms->GetPeerPid() & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID) )
00450                 {
00451                         if ( ms->IsConnected() )
00452                         {
00453                                 return ms;
00454                         }
00455                 }
00456         }
00457 
00458         return NULL;
00459 }
00460 
00462 bool TcpServer::DisconnectPeerId(unsigned int PeerId)
00463 {
00464         MsgSocket * ms;
00465         bool ret = false;
00466         unsigned int SearchId = PeerId & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID;
00467                 
00468         for( listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00469         {
00470                 ms = listConnections.GetCurrent();
00471                 if( ms->IsConnected() == false )
00472                 {
00473                         delete listConnections.GetCurrent();
00474                         listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00475                         continue;
00476                 }
00477 
00478                 if ( SearchId == (ms->GetPeerPid() & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID) )
00479                 {
00480                         delete listConnections.GetCurrent();
00481                         listConnections.RemoveCurrent();
00482                         ret = true;
00483                         continue;
00484                 }
00485         }
00486 
00487         return ret;
00488 }
00489 
00490 bool TcpServer::SetTcpNoDelay(bool Set)
00491 {
00492         bool ReturnCode = true;
00493 
00494         if ( Set == TcpNoDelayMode )
00495                 return true;
00496 
00497         listConnections.Lock();
00498 
00499         TcpNoDelayMode = Set;
00500 
00501         for(listConnections.First(); listConnections.NotAtEnd(); listConnections.Next() )
00502         {
00503                 ReturnCode = ReturnCode & listConnections.GetCurrent()->SetTcpNoDelay(TcpNoDelayMode);
00504         }
00505 
00506         listConnections.Unlock();
00507 
00508         return ReturnCode;
00509 }

00531 bool TcpServer::IsStillConnected(unsigned int peer_id)
00532 { 
00533         bool res = false;
00534         listConnections.Lock();
00535         res = FindClientFromId(peer_id) != NULL; 
00536         listConnections.Unlock();
00537         return res;
00538 }
